name: 强化战役-再临
author: 24岁是个鼠标
description:
我们通过行星发射终端的加速器发射到了这颗星球,当地人称它为赛普拉
这里十分繁华，但敌人不太欢迎我们
同时我们的科技也遗失了
你能征服这颗比赛普罗更加强大的星球吗
模组作者:鼠标

We launched to this planet through the accelerator of the planet launch terminal, which is locally known as Sepura. It is very prosperous here, but the enemy does not welcome us very much. At the same time, our technology has also been lost. Can you conquer this planet, which is even more powerful in the race? Module author: Mouse



\n欢迎进群927366409
